page.title: 20Education 2
page.content: Norley C.E. Primary School is housed in very old buildings. It was built in 1838 as a Sunday School and both the school and the church are situated on the edge of the village. "Our school is very old. Most of us have to come to school by car as we mostly live a distance away. When we are old enough some of us come on bike in the summer time. We have got three classes in our school. When we leave next summer we will go to Helsby High School about 6 miles away by bus. We are supposed to be having a new school built down Hough Lane in a year or two but me and my friends will all have gone to High School by then."
